info.name: Izam Inventory API
info.description:
Full API collection for the Izam Inventory Management System.

Covers Auth, Inventory Items, Warehouses, and Stock Transfers with success, validation error, auth error, and edge case scenarios.

## Setup
1. Import the environment file alongside this collection.
2. Run **Login - Success** first to auto-set the `{{token}}` variable.
3. All authenticated requests use `Bearer {{token}}` automatically.

item.name: Auth
item.description: Authentication endpoints: register, login, logout, me.
